widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (75, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (39, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68, 0), size = (207, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (290, 0), size = (681, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (934, 0), size = (39, 75), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (75, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (39, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (68, 0), size = (207, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (290, 0), size = (681, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (934, 0), size = (39, 75), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 33)], "itemHeight": 75 }

screen.name: CCcamInfoMain
screen.applet: from enigma import eListboxPythonMultiContent, gFont self["menu"].l.setFont(0, gFont("Regular", 33))

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.applet: from enigma import getDesktop, eSize, ePoint desktop_w = getDesktop(0).size().width() desktop_h = getDesktop(0).size().height() listcount = 0 itemheight = 75 maxwidth = desktop_w - 120 minwidth = desktop_w // 2 listwidth = self["list"].instance.size().width() + 120 # 120 for button width and padding if listwidth > maxwidth: listwidth = maxwidth if listwidth < minwidth: listwidth = minwidth if self["list"] and self.list is not None: listcount = len(self.list) if listcount > 10: listcount = 10 if not self["text"].text: textsize = (listwidth, 0) else: textsizeoriginal = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (listwidth, textsizeoriginal[1]) listsize = (listwidth, itemheight*listcount) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(0, 0)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1] + 30)) wsizex = listwidth wsizey = textsize[1] + listsize[1] + 60 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((desktop_w-wsizex)//2, (desktop_h-wsizey)//2))

eLabel.text: Press up/down to scroll. < > for now/next description.

widget.convert: { "templates": { # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # data[1:] = [helpText] "default": (78,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(1133, 78), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), ] ), # Simple help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": (78,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(1193, 78), font=0, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(1133, 78), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), ] ), # Extended help with no headings # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] "extended": (78,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(1133, 78), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(0, 0), font=3, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text=2), # pointless description placed in the lists - dont show it - height the list item with heading size only ], ), # Extended help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries "extended+headings": (78,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(1193, 78), font=0, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(30, 0), size=(1133, 78), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0, 0), size=(0, 0), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text=3), # pointless description placed in the lists - dont show it - height the list item with heading size only ], ), }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 78 }

MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 0), size = (480, 75), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # Language name (Native). screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import getDesktop, eSize, ePoint desktop_w = getDesktop(0).size().width() desktop_h = getDesktop(0).size().height() listcount = 0 iconsize = 53 itemheight = 45 padding = 45 maxwidth = desktop_w - 120 minwidth = desktop_w // 2 listwidth = self["list"].instance.size().width() + (iconsize + padding) if listwidth > maxwidth: listwidth = maxwidth if listwidth < minwidth: listwidth = minwidth maxtextwidth = listwidth minheight = iconsize if self["list"] and self.list is not None: listcount = len(self.list) if itemheight*listcount > minheight: minheight = itemheight*listcount if not self["text"].text: textsize = (maxtextwidth, 0) else: textsizeoriginal = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (maxtextwidth, textsizeoriginal[1]) listsize = (maxtextwidth, itemheight*listcount) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(iconsize + padding, 0)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(iconsize + padding, textsize[1] + 30)) wsizex = listwidth wsizey = textsize[1] + listsize[1] + 60 if wsizey < minheight: wsizey = minheight wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint((desktop_w-wsizex)//2, (desktop_h-wsizey)//2))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (279, 8), size = (1193, 45), font=0, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (279, 45), size = (1193, 75), font=1, flags = RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (129, 8), size = (120, 120), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",36),gFont("Regular",30)], "itemHeight": 128 }

widget.convert: {"template":[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (80, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 1), size = (150, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is csystem MultiContentEntryText(pos = (250, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is hop 1 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (290, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is hop 2 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (330, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is hop 3 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (370, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is hop 4 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (410, 1), size = (40, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 6), # index 6 is hop 5 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (480, 1), size = (70, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 7), # index 7 is sum of cards for caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (550, 1), size = (80, 33), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 8), # index 8 is reshare MultiContentEntryText(pos = (630, 1), size = (1024, 50), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 9), # index 9 is providers ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",27)], "itemHeight": 54 }
